QuestData.Title: Vile Plans
QuestData.Description: The text on the note is written in some dark, indecipherable scrawl. The more you stare at them, the more the symbols seem to twist and burn before your eyes. There is only one in Thrallmar that can transcribe such vile script - the blood elf Magister Bloodhawk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Burning Legion Missive to Magister Bloodhawk in Thrallmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: I have little time to waste, $C. What is this you pester me with?
QuestData.RewardText: You were right to bring this to my attention. This could be a production order for additional fel reavers - or new attack plans! This will take some time to decipher. Leave me. I will summon you when I know more. $B$B<Magister Bloodhawk nods to you as you turn to leave> $B$BYou are a sharp one, $N. I shall be watching your progress with interest.
